channel.title: Blogs on kaus.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on kaus.dev

item.title: 🤓☝ Software Engineering Best Practices For Data Scientists
item.description: Did you ever need to make some changes to an ML project that you worked on a long time ago? Very likely it was not a pleasant experience.

item.title: 📚 Online Courses for Software Engineers and Data Scientists
item.description: Online courses are a great way for Software Engineers as well as Data Scientists to expand the technical skill set. In this blog post, I will describe key takeaways of completed online courses and evaluate them.
